lemming.data

Interface IDao<E>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - entity type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICharacterDao, IContextDao, IInboundContextDao, IInboundContextGroupDao, ILemmaDao, IPosDao, ISenseDao, IUserDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CharacterDao, ContextDao, GenericDao, InboundContextDao, InboundContextGroupDao, LemmaDao, PosDao, SenseDao, UserDao

    public interface IDao<E>
    The root interface of the DAO hierarchy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      E find(java.lang.Object primaryKey)
      Find by primary key.
      java.util.List<E> getAll()
      Delivers a list with all entity instances.
      java.lang.Boolean isTransient(E element)
      Checks if an object is transient.
      E merge(E entity)
      Merge the state of the given entity into the current persistence context.
      void panicOnRemoveLockingError(java.lang.Object element, java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
      Sends the user to an error page if removing of data failed due to locking.
      void panicOnRemoveUnresolvableObjectError(java.lang.Object element, java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
      Sends the user to an error page if removing of data failed due to an unresolvable object.
      void panicOnSaveLockingError(java.lang.Object element, java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
      Sends the user to an error page if saving of data failed due to locking.
      void panicOnSaveUnresolvableObjectError(java.lang.Object element, java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
      Sends the user to an error page if saving of data failed due to an unresolvable object.
      void persist(E entity)
      Makes an instance managed and persistent.
      E refresh(E entity)
      Refresh the state of the instance from the database, overwriting changes made to the entity, if any.
      void remove(E entity)
      Removes the entity instance.
      void removeByPrimaryKey(java.lang.Object primaryKey)
      Removes the entity instance found by primary key, if any.

    • Method Detail

      • isTransient

        java.lang.Boolean isTransient(E element)
        Checks if an object is transient.
        Parameters:
        element - element to check
        Returns:
        True if element is transient; false otherwise.

      • persist

        void persist(E entity)
        Makes an instance managed and persistent.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity instance

      • merge

        E merge(E entity)
        Merge the state of the given entity into the current persistence context.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity instance
        Returns:
        The managed instance that the state was merged to.

      • remove

        void remove(E entity)
        Removes the entity instance.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity instance

      • removeByPrimaryKey

        void removeByPrimaryKey(java.lang.Object primaryKey)
        Removes the entity instance found by primary key, if any.
        Parameters:
        primaryKey - primary key

      • refresh

        E refresh(E entity)
        Refresh the state of the instance from the database, overwriting changes made to the entity, if any.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity instance
        Returns:
        The managed instance that was refreshed.

      • find

        E find(java.lang.Object primaryKey)
        Find by primary key. Search for an entity of the specified class and primary key. If the entity instance is contained in the persistence context, it is returned from there.
        Parameters:
        primaryKey - primary key
        Returns:
        The found entity instance or null if the entity does not exist.

      • getAll

        java.util.List<E> getAll()
        Delivers a list with all entity instances.
        Returns:
        A list of entity instances.

      • panicOnSaveLockingError

        void panicOnSaveLockingError(java.lang.Object element,
                             java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
        Sends the user to an error page if saving of data failed due to locking.
        Parameters:
        element - the element that was not saved
        exception - the raised exception

      • panicOnRemoveLockingError

        void panicOnRemoveLockingError(java.lang.Object element,
                               java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
        Sends the user to an error page if removing of data failed due to locking.
        Parameters:
        element - the element that was not removed
        exception - the raised exception

        element - the element that was not saved
        exception - the raised exception
